entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 2:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: ENE 26 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening then changing to periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
